name: Premium Bi-Fold Wallet - Horween® Shell Cordovan No.8 & Cashew
description:
• Super Premium Horween® Shell Cordovan leather & Veg-Tan 'Cashew' leather
  • Bi Fold design, easy size to fit in pocket
  • Can hold £50 or $50 notes and up to 12 credit cards
  • Measures 4.5" x 3.5" x 1/2" in depth when folded
  • 100% handmade in the UK
  • Free UK Shipping on this item

Available Colours

 Questions? info@ashdownworkshop.co.uk
Frequently Asked Questions
Customer Reviews
The Premium Bi Fold Wallet, our most premium wallet, just got even better! Not only does this item take more time to make and equipped with more storage than any other wallet that we stock, but this limited edition version combines a super premium Horween® Shell Cordovan leather outer and our premium 'Cashew' veg-tan inner. The wallet features 7 pockets which are made up of 6 card slots and one note section to the back. Big enough to fit £50 or $50 notes and capable of holding up to 12 cards. All of our wallets are 100% handmade with no use of any machines. Hand cut with a half moon leather knife and then hand-stitched with Northern Ireland linen thread, which is hand-waxed prior to stitching to add extra durability and life to the thread. This product is made in our workshop located in Sussex, England. This product comes packaged in our own hand-stamped cotton bag and Limited Black Edition gift box.

About Horween® Shell Cordovan

Genuine Shell Cordovan is the art of tanning at its finest. More than just a color, it is a very specific leather, from a particular part of a horsehide. The irregular oval shaped shells are tanned, stuffed, shaved, and then polished – a process taking at least six months. Each shell is slowly steeped in gentle vegetable liquors. The shells are genuine hot stuffed then slicked onto glass frames to dry. Each shell is hand curried and shaved by highly skilled artisans to expose the shell. Dyes are hand rubbed on for a deep aniline finish. Finally, the shells are hand glazed to achieve the rich, glossy look and feel prized by fine craftsmen.

Shipping

This product is handmade to order and will be dispatched within 10 working days of placing your order. Please read our Customer Service Page for more dispatch/delivery information before ordering. Times may vary depending upon destination country and customs processing.

name: Ashdown Workshop By Calepino - Leatherworkers Notebook 3 Pack & Leather Cover
description:
• Premium Notebook set with leather cover
  • Exclusive collaboration with Calepino
  • Can hold one notebook, standard size such as Field Notes or Moleskin (90mm/3.5" x 140mm/5.5")
  • Cover Measures 6" (H) x 4" (W) x 1/2" in depth when folded
  • Available in four colour options
  • Cover - 100% handmade in the UK. Notebooks - Made in France
  • Limited Print Edition of 500 notebooks.
We're pleased to announce our first special project as The Ashdown Workshop Company works in collaboration with French notebooks makers, Calepino. We've worked together to create this premium notebook set which includes a 3 pack of Ashdown Workshop By Calepino Notebooks, 1 Calepino Pen (Bic M10 Clic), 1 Calepino Pencil (made in the traditional way in the Loire region for Calepino ) and one premium veg-tan leather notebook cover made here in our sussex workshop. The Notebook Cover Our premium leather notebook cover is 100% handmade with no use of any machines. We Hand cut the veg-tan leather with a half moon leather knife and then hand-stitched with Northern Ireland linen thread, which is hand-waxed prior to stitching to add extra durability and life to the thread. This product is made in our workshop located in Sussex, England. Over time the leather will age beautifully and uniquely with use, darkening in colour to produce a rich patina. The Notebook The covers are made from cardboard elaborated by a french card-maker at the start of the 20th century and inside you'll find 48 blue-squared pages finely printed on 90g blank paper chosen specially for precision. Custom dual-branded, royal blue band on outer covers. Custom inner front and inner back pages which include ruled edge and custom artwork. Specification: 48 green-squared pages finely printed on 90g blank paper chosen specially for precision. 9.0 cm × 14.0 cm, 48 pages, squares: 5.0 x 5.0 mm, Width of card: 5/10mm, Paper: 90g wood-free This product comes packaged in our own hand-stamped cotton bag and gift box. Leather Cover handmade in the UK. Limited Edition - Notebooks printed as a limited run of 500 pieces.

Shipping

This product is handmade to order and will be dispatched within 10 working days of placing your order. Please read our Customer Service Page for more dispatch/delivery information before ordering. name: Premium Coin Bi-Fold Wallet - Raven
description:
• Premium 5oz & 3oz veg-tan leather
  • Bi Fold design, easy size to fit in pocket
  • Can hold £50 or $50 notes and up to 8 credit cards
  • Separate section to hold coins
  • Measures 4.5" x 3.5" x 1/2" in depth when folded
  • 100% handmade in the UK

Available Colours

 Questions? info@ashdownworkshop.co.uk
Frequently Asked Questions
Customer Reviews
This is our latest wallet which we see as an alternative to our Premium Bi-Fold Wallet. We re-designed the wallet slightly to now incorporate a new coin section. We've left 3 card slots inside, whilst also making a forth slot card/receipt section behind the coin section itself. The card holding capacity of this wallet is near that of our Premium Bi-Fold Wallet but now allows you to carry coins as well. Made from a combination of 5oz and 3oz 'Raven' Madison shoulder veg-tanned leather, all sourced locally in the UK. The wallet features 6 pockets which are made up of 4 card slots, 1 coin pouch and one note section to the back. The Coin Bi-Fold Wallet is big enough to fit £50 or $50 notes and capable of holding up to 8 cards. All of our wallets are 100% handmade with no use of any machines. Hand cut with a half moon leather knife and then hand-stitched with Northern Ireland linen thread, which is hand-waxed prior to stitching to add extra durability and life to the thread. This product is made in our workshop located in Sussex, England. Over time the leather will age beautifully and uniquely with use, darkening in colour to produce a dark brown patina. This product comes packaged in our own hand-stamped cotton bag and gift box.

Shipping

This product is handmade to order and will be dispatched within 10 working days of placing your order. Please read our Customer Service Page for more dispatch/delivery information before ordering. name: Pashley Belt - Raven
description:
• Premium 9oz Gaucho belting leather
  • Currently 3 sizes available
  • Available with Brass or Nickel Hardware
  • Measures 1.5" in width
  • Exchangeable buckle
  • 100% handmade in the UK

Available Colours

 Questions? info@ashdownworkshop.co.uk
Frequently Asked Questions
Customer Reviews
The Pashley Belt is our newest and thickest belt to date. Using a 9oz 'Raven' Gaucho belting leather we cut this down in house to a thickness of 1.5". We then skim the edges on both sides and apply an edge dye by hand to give the belt a uniform colour and to protect the newly cut leather. Holes are then punched in preparation for two press studs. A hand sewn keeper and solid antique brass/nickel plated roller buckle are added. The buckle is interchangeable if you wish to switch to an old favourite or a different colour. All of our belts are 100% handmade with no use of any machines and are hand cut with a half moon leather knife. The leather edges have been treated to stop premature wearing, this will add a subtle sheen and darkening to the leather. This product is made in our workshop located in Sussex, England. This product comes packaged in our own hand-stamped cotton bag and gift box. Handmade in the UK.

Sizing

Small - Suitable for waist sizes 30" - 32" Medium - Suitable for waist sizes 33" - 35" Large - Suitable for waist sizes 36" - 38"

Shipping

This product is handmade to order and will be dispatched within 10 working days of placing your order. Please read our Customer Service Page for more dispatch/delivery information before ordering. name: Leather Braided Bracelet - Raven
description:
• The Leather Braided Bracelet
  • Premium 5oz veg-tan leather
  • 100% handmade in the UK
  • Available in a range of sizes
Our Leather Braided Bracelet is now available in Raven. This bracelet is a great jewellery piece, constructed from the same Madison Shoulder veg-tan leather used in the majority of our leather items.

Hand made from one single piece of leather, an 'impossible braid' process is used to create a braid that is unbroken. The bracelet is then joined together with a single press stud. Made from a premium 5oz 'Raven' Madison shoulder veg-tanned leather*, all sourced locally in the UK. Over time the leather will age beautifully and uniquely with use. All of our products are 100% handmade with no use of any machines and are hand cut with a half moon leather knife. The leather edges have been treated to stop premature wearing, this will add a subtle sheen and darkening to the leather. This product is made in our workshop located in Sussex, England. This product comes packaged in our own hand-stamped cotton bag and gift box. Handmade in the UK.

Sizing

Measure the circumference around the smallest part of your wrist and then select from the drop down menu above which bracelet size will be best for you. For a tight fit, order the same size as your wrist measurement. For an average fit, order one size up from your wrist measurement. For a loose fit, order two sizes up from your wrist measurement.

Please contact us if you require a custom size that is not included in our standard sizing range. Handmade in the UK.

name: Passport Holder
description:
• Premium 5oz veg-tan leather
  • Bi Fold design, easy size to fit in pocket
  • Can hold two standard size passports (90 x 125mm or 3.5" x 4.9")
  • Measures 5.5" (H) x 4" (W) x 1/4" in depth when folded
  • Available in three colour options
  • 100% handmade in the UK
Here is our new Passport Holder, the ideal travel accessory to keep your passport's, tickets, currency and boarding passes safe. We've made the holder large enough to accommodate two standard size passports (90 x 125mm or 3.5" x 4.9"), one in each size compartment. The Passport Holder also has enough room to additionally hold tickets and any other documents that you might find yourself taking on your trip with you. We've incorporated a press stud closure into the design which allows the holder to be securely fastened shut, leaving your passports and any documents safely stored inside. All of our leather products are 100% handmade with no use of any machines. Hand cut with a half moon leather knife and then hand-stitched with Northern Ireland linen thread, which is hand-waxed prior to stitching to add extra durability and life to the thread. This product is made in our workshop located in Sussex, England. Over time the leather will age beautifully and uniquely with use, darkening in colour to produce a rich caramel brown patina. name: Standard Belt - Raven
description:
• Premium 7oz Saldago belting leather
  • Currently 3 sizes available
  • Available with Brass or Nickel Hardware
  • Measures 1.5" in width
  • Exchangeable buckle
  • 100% handmade in the UK
Our Standard Belt really has nothing standard about it! Using a 7oz 'Raven' Saldago belting leather we cut this down in house to a thickness of 1.5". We then skim the edges on both sides and apply an edge dye by hand to give the belt a uniform colour and to protect the newly cut leather. Holes are then punched in preparation for two press studs. A hand sewn keeper and solid antique brass/nickel plated roller buckle are added. The buckle is interchangeable if you wish to switch to an old favourite or a different colour. All of our belts are 100% handmade with no use of any machines and are hand cut with a half moon leather knife. The leather edges have been treated to stop premature wearing, this will add a subtle sheen and darkening to the leather. This product is made in our workshop located in Sussex, England. This product comes packaged in our own hand-stamped cotton bag and gift box.

Sizing

Small - Suitable for waist sizes 30" - 32" Medium - Suitable for waist sizes 33" - 35" Large - Suitable for waist sizes 36" - 38"

  • Safe way to clip your keys and/or wallet to yourself

name: Fiebings Mink Oil Liquid
description:
• Genuine Fiebing's Mink Oil Liquid
  • Part of The Ashdown Workshop Co. leather care pack
  • Softens, preserves and waterproofs leather products
  • 8 Fl Oz / 236ml bottle
This is the perfect leather care product to keep all of your Ashdown Workshop leather goods looking as fresh as the day that you bought them. This item can also be used on handbags, belts, saddles, shoes, luggage and leather furniture. Fiebing's Mink Oil Liquid softens, preserves and waterproofs shoes, boots and all smooth articles of leather.

Directions for Use

Apply mink oil freely and work into leather. We always recommend testing product for colour-fastness and effect on a discrete test area first to make sure you are pleased with the results before going on to treat the entire product. Contains active ingredients: Mink Oil, Silicone, Lanolin and Pure Neatsfoot oil. Caution: Will darken light coloured, such as out 'Cashew' items, and unfinished leather. Not for use on suede or nubuck leather.

name: Chelsea Dubbin Leatherfood
description:
• Genuine Chelsea Dubbin Leatherfood
  • Part of The Ashdown Workshop Co. leather care pack
  • Nourishes & protects all fine leatherware
  • 6.25 Oz / 210ml tub
We've selected Chelsea Dubbin Leatherfood to be part of our care package that we recommend to keep all of your Ashdown Workshop products protected and maintained. This item can also be used on handbags, belts, saddles, shoes, luggage and leather furniture. Produced by Caswell & Co. Ltd of Chelsea London, Chelsea Dubbin Leatherfood protects and preserves your most loved leather items. Unlike other preparations Chelsea leather Food will not prevent the leather from being polished. Continued use of this unique leather dressing will assist in preserving the natural properties of leather in extreme climatic conditions and will not damage stitching. Made in England.

Directions for Use

Remove excess dirt and mud if present and allow leather item to dry naturally. Then apply Chelsea Leather Food, which contains only natural oils and waxes, with a clean cloth working well into the leather. Leave to penetrate, preferably overnight. We always recommend testing product for colour-fastness and effect on a discrete test area first to make sure you are pleased with the results before going on to treat the entire product.

name: Fiebings Snow Proof Paste
description:
• Genuine Fiebing's Snow-Proof Paste
  • Part of The Ashdown Workshop Co. leather care pack
  • Premium weatherproofing product, unequalled for all-weather protection
  • 3 Oz / 85g tub
Fiebing's Snow-Proof Paste is the ideal leather care product to keep all your Ashdown Workshop leather items protected from harsh weather such as water, ice and snow. This item can also be used on handbags, belts, saddles, shoes, luggage and leather furniture. Fiebing's Snow-Proof Paste helps prevent mildew, dry rot, salt stains and scuff marks. It not only softens and protects leather but also is used to restore and preserve your most treasured leather products. Snow Proof Paste continues to be a strong favourite since it's first production back in 1904 , mainly due to it's colourless, odourless and non-greasy properties.

Directions for Use

For best results apply a light coat when leather is clean, dry and warm. Wipe off excess. We always recommend testing product for colour-fastness and effect on a discrete test area first to make sure you are pleased with the results before going on to treat the entire product. Caution: Not recommended for suede leather. May darken light coloured leather such as our 'Cashew' items.

  • Part of The Ashdown Workshop Co. leather care pack

This is the perfect leather care product to keep all of your Ashdown Workshop leather goods looking as fresh as the day that you bought them. Fiebing's famous Saddle Soap cleans leather and lubricates the fibres to prevent brittleness... maintaining suppleness and strength. description:
